metadata.synopsis: A traveling couple is stuck on Rivington bridge and discuss lodging option. The flophouse is not their prefered choice, but the alternative is Sharess Caress. This is the half-orc one liner
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to 6; 52; 66- Talk to the Half-orc.

0.speaker: Crak
0.text: I hope you have better luck than us finding a room - pickings are slim.

1.speaker: Crak
1.text: The missus and I have been dreaming about the city - no more sleeping rough. Didn't expect to find it locked down tighter than a Watcher's fist.
